|62–90 (h) |69–78 (a) |} ==Record== KK Šibenik has overall, from 1981–82 (first participation) to 1994–95 (last participation): 23 wins against 27 defeats in 50 games for all the European club competitions. * EuroLeague ** FIBA Saporta Cup *** FIBA Korać Cup: 23–27 (50) == See also == * Yugoslav basketball clubs in European competitions ==External links== *FIBA Europe *EuroLeague *ULEB
